African Violet (Saintpaulia ionantha).water: Water when top inch of soil is dry; avoid getting water on leaves
common_problems: Leaf spots from cold water on leaves

Aloe Vera.water: Water deeply but infrequently; let soil dry completely between waterings
common_problems: Brown tips from too much direct sun

Anthurium (Anthurium andraeanum).water: Water when top inch is dry; likes consistent moisture
common_problems: Brown leaf tips from low humidity

Areca Palm (Dypsis lutescens).water: Keep soil slightly moist; water when top 2 inches are dry

Asparagus Fern (Asparagus setaceus).water: Keep evenly moist; don't let soil dry out completely

Begonia (Begonia spp.).water: Water when top inch is dry; avoid waterlogged soil
common_problems: Powdery mildew in poor air circulation

Bird of Paradise (Strelitzia reginae).water: Water every 1-2 weeks; let soil dry between waterings

Birds Nest Fern (Asplenium nidus).water: Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy; water around edges, not center
common_problems: Brown frond tips from low humidity

Boston Fern (Nephrolepis exaltata).water: Keep soil evenly moist at all times

Calathea.water: Keep evenly moist; use filtered or distilled water (sensitive to chemicals)
common_problems: Brown leaf edges from tap water or low humidity

Cast Iron Plant (Aspidistra elatior).water: Water when top 2 inches are dry; very drought tolerant
common_problems: Very few problems; brown tips from overfertilizing

Chinese Money Plant (Pilea peperomioides.water: Water when top inch is dry; allow good drainage
common_problems: Curling leaves from too much sun

Chinese evergreen (Aglaonema).water: Water when top inch is dry; tolerates some neglect

Christmas Cactus (Schlumbergera bridgesi.water: Water when top inch is dry; reduce watering after blooming

Chrysanthemum.water: Keep soil evenly moist; don't let it dry out
common_problems: Powdery mildew from poor air circulation

Ctenanthe.water: Keep evenly moist; use filtered water
common_problems: Brown leaf edges from dry air
Fading patterns from too much sun

Daffodils (Narcissus spp.).water: Water regularly during growth; reduce after flowers fade
common_problems: Blind buds from planting too shallow

Dracaena.water: Water when top half of soil is dry; sensitive to fluoride in tap water
common_problems: Brown leaf tips from tap water fluoride

Dumb Cane (Dieffenbachia spp.).water: Water when top inch is dry; keep evenly moist in growing season
common_problems: CAUTION: Sap is toxic if ingested

Elephant Ear (Alocasia spp.).water: Keep soil moist but not waterlogged; reduce in winter

English Ivy (Hedera helix).water: Keep slightly moist; let top inch dry between waterings
common_problems: Spider mites in dry indoor air

Hyacinth (Hyacinthus orientalis).water: Keep soil moist but not waterlogged during growth

Iron Cross begonia (Begonia masoniana).water: Water when top inch is dry; avoid wetting leaves

Jade plant (Crassula ovata).water: Water when soil is completely dry; very drought tolerant

Kalanchoe.water: Water when soil is dry; reduce in winter

Lilium (Hemerocallis).water: Keep soil evenly moist during growing season

common_problems: CAUTION: All parts are highly toxic
Fungal leaf spots in humid conditions

Money Tree (Pachira aquatica).water: Water when top 2-3 inches are dry; avoid overwatering

Monstera Deliciosa (Monstera deliciosa).water: Water every 1-2 weeks; let soil dry between waterings

Orchid.water: Water when growing medium is nearly dry; soak and drain method
common_problems: Crown rot from water sitting in leaves

Parlor Palm (Chamaedorea elegans).water: Water when top inch is dry; don't let sit in water
common_problems: Brown tips from dry air or overwatering

Peace lily.water: Water when leaves just start to droop slightly; keep moist
common_problems: Brown leaf tips from tap water chemicals

Poinsettia (Euphorbia pulcherrima).water: Water when soil surface feels dry; avoid waterlogging
common_problems: Leaf drop from cold drafts or dry air

Polka Dot Plant (Hypoestes phyllostachya.water: Keep soil evenly moist; don't let dry out completely
common_problems: Fading color from too little light
Leggy growth; pinch tips to encourage bushiness

Ponytail Palm (Beaucarnea recurvata).water: Water every 2-3 weeks; very drought tolerant (stores water in trunk)
common_problems: Brown leaf tips from very low humidity

Pothos (Ivy arum).water: Water when top inch or two is dry; very forgiving
common_problems: Loss of variegation in low light

Prayer Plant (Maranta leuconeura).water: Keep moist but not soggy; use filtered water
common_problems: Brown leaf edges from dry air or tap water

Rattlesnake Plant (Calathea lancifolia).water: Keep evenly moist; use distilled or filtered water
common_problems: Fading patterns from too much direct sun

Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica).water: Water when top inch is dry; wipe leaves to remove dust

Sago Palm (Cycas revoluta).water: Water when soil is dry; do not overwater

Schefflera.water: Water when top inch is dry; allow to dry more in winter
common_problems: Dropping leaves from overwatering or cold drafts

Snake plant (Sanseviera).light: Low Light to Direct Sunlight (extremely adaptable)
Snake plant (Sanseviera).water: Water every 2-6 weeks; let soil dry completely between waterings
common_problems: Root rot from overwatering (most common killer)
Mushy base from cold and wet soil

Tradescantia.water: Water when top inch is dry; keep soil lightly moist
common_problems: Leggy growth; prune often to encourage fullness
Loss of color in low light
Floppy stems from warm indoor temperatures

Venus Flytrap.water: Keep soil constantly moist with distilled or rainwater only; NO tap water

Yucca.water: Water when top half of soil is dry; very drought tolerant
common_problems: Brown leaf tips in very dry air

ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia).light: Low Light to Bright Indirect (extremely adaptable)
ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia).water: Water every 2-4 weeks; extremely drought tolerant
common_problems: Yellow leaves from overwatering (most common issue)
Slow growth in very low light
